import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { baseUrl } from './baseUrl' function OrderHistory() { const navigate=useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{window.scrollTo(0,0); getorderitem()},[]) useEffect(()=>{ const lc=localStorage.getItem("user") if(lc!=="yes"){ navigate("/Login") } }) const [underline, setUnderline]= useState(false) const [orderItem, setOrderItem]= useState([]) const [showorder, setShoworder]= useState(false) const getorderitem=()=>{ axios.get(baseUrl+"order").then((res)=>setOrderItem(res.data.data)) } return (


{showorder===true?
My Account

{orderItem.filter((i)=>i.orderId===localStorage.getItem("orderId")).map((i)=> )}
PRODUCT PRICE QUANTITY Total
navigate("/ProductView")}>{i.order[0]?.title} {i.order[0]?.price} {i.order[0]?.quantity} Rs. {i.totalPrice}
Subtotal
Shipping		 Rs.{orderItem[0]?.totalPrice}
Rs. 0
Total Rs. {orderItem[0]?.totalPrice}


{/* */}
:
My Account

{orderItem.length>0? {orderItem.map((i)=> )}
Order Date Payment Status Fulfillment Status Total
{i.date} Pending Unfulfilled Rs. {i.totalPrice}
: }


{/* */}
}

) } export default OrderHistory
